# includesAllActivity

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the event includes all applications, categories, and web domains.

## Declaration

```swift
var includesAllActivity: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Use `includesAllActivity` to determine the content of the scheduled event. Evaluates to `true` if [doc://com.apple.DeviceActivity/documentation/DeviceActivity/DeviceActivityEvent/applications], [doc://com.apple.DeviceActivity/documentation/DeviceActivity/DeviceActivityEvent/categories], and [doc://com.apple.DeviceActivity/documentation/DeviceActivity/DeviceActivityEvent/webDomains] are empty; otherwise `false`.

## Creating an Event

- **init(applications:categories:webDomains:threshold:)**: Creates a new event.
- **DeviceActivityEvent.Name**: The unique name of an event.
